com.paypal.selion.utils

Class SauceLabsRestApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.utils.SauceLabsRestApi

  • public final class SauceLabsRestApi
extends Object
    A simple helper class for querying some of the sauce labs account details via their rest api.

      • MAX_CACHE

        public static final int MAX_CACHE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SauceLabsRestApi

        public SauceLabsRestApi()
        Creates a new instance. Uses the current (@link SauceConfigReader#getInstance()} to initialize sauce connection details (url, authKey, etc) that will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfTCRunning

        public int getNumberOfTCRunning()
        Get the total number of test cases running in sauce labs for the primary account.
        Returns:
        number of test cases running, -1 on failure calling sauce labs.

      • getNumberOfTCRunningForSubAccount

        public int getNumberOfTCRunningForSubAccount(String user)
        Get the number of test cases running in sauce labs for the sauce labs sub-account/user
        Parameters:
        user - id of the sub-account
        Returns:
        number of test case running or -1 on failure

      • getMaxConcurrency

        public int getMaxConcurrency()
        Get the maximum number of test case that can run in parallel for the primary account.
        Returns:
        maximum number of test case or -1 on failure calling sauce labs

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated(String username,
                      String apiKey)
        Determine if the account credentials specified are valid by calling the sauce rest api. Uses a local account cache for credentials which have already been presented. Cached credentials expire when the cache reaches a size of MAX_CACHE
        Parameters:
        username - the user name
        apiKey - the sauce labs api access key
        Returns:
        true on success. false if unauthorized or unable to call sauce.
